title: Best of The Herd: 12/03/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/03/2018
description:
Colin compares the Patriots to Starbucks because they are consistent no matter where or when they play. He thinks Aaron Rodgers got exactly what he wanted but not necessarily what is best for the Packers moving forward. Plus, former Packers WR Greg Jennings talks about Mike McCarthy being fired and Super Bowl Champion Trent Dilfer explains why the Steelers are no longer a Super Bowl contender. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
